resources.string:
1. On phone[1] click [EXPORT] to export storage as json file to sdcard/TelinkSigMeshSetting directory

 2. Copy json file to phone[2]'s sdcard

 3. Click [select file] to select json file , then click [IMPORT] to load json file and sync storage

 4. Back to home page, and waiting for mesh reconnect

string-array.name: share_flow
string-array.item: 1. On phone[1] click [EXPORT] to export storage as json file to sdcard/TelinkSigMeshSetting directory
2. Copy json file to phone[2]\'s sdcard
3. Click [select file] to select json file , then click [IMPORT] to load json file and sync storage
4. Back to home page, and waiting for mesh reconnect
